titleStmt.title: Authority file of organisations relevant for the history of Arabic Periodicals

org.orgName: Arquivo Público do Estado de São Paulo
Atatürk Kitapliği, Digital Collection (available only at computers in the AKI), Istanbul

org.note: . Some holdings are currently in the process of digitization and are made availabe through the Digital Assets Repository.

org.orgName: Bibliothèque Générale et Archives de Tétouan, Tetouan, Morocco
Bibliothèque Orientale, Université de Saint Joseph, Beirut
Bibliothèque interuniversitaire des langues orientales, INALCO (Institut National des Langues et Civilisations Orientales, Paris)

org.note: . Provides access to inter-library loan of microfilms as well as digital collections. Access to the collection is restricted to member institutions.

org.orgName: Centre des Archives Diplomatiques, la Courneuve, Paris
Dār al-Kutub al-Qawmiyya (Egyptian National Library), Cairo
Dār al-Kutub al-Qawmiyya Microfilm Collection (Egyptian National Library), Cairo
Dār al-Kutub al-Waṭaniyya (Lebanese National Library), Beirut (closed, its collections moved)
Dāʾirat al-Maktaba al-Waṭaniyya, al-Urdun (Administration of National Library, Jordan)
Freie Universität Berlin, Library of the Institut für Islamwissenschaft
Freie Universität Berlin, Library of the Seminar für Semitistik und Arabistik
Hakkı Tarık Us Collection of Beyazit State Library, Istanbul
org.note: . The collection of periodicals was digitized by the Beyazit State Library and the Tokyo University of Foreign Studies and is available online.

org.orgName: Immigration History Research Center Archives, University of Minnesota
Institut Dominicain d'Études Orientales au Caire, Cairo
Institute of Oriental Manuscripts, Russian Academy of Sciences, St. Petersburg

org.note: . Some of its holdings were digitized and are available through the World Digital Library.

org.orgName: Kew Library, Royal Botanic Gardens, Kew
Libraries of Harvard University, Cambridge, MA, USA
Libraries of the University of Cambridge
Middle East Centre Library, St Antony's College, Oxford
Milli Kütüphanesi (National Library of Turkey), Digital Periodical Collection (available online), Ankara

note.note: no entries in the table match this holding

org.orgName: Moise A. Khayrallah Center for Lebanese Diaspora Studies, NC State University
Muʾassasat al-Maḥfūẓāt al-Waṭaniyya, Beirut (Centre des Archives Nationales)

org.note: Their collection of Ottoman and mandate Arabic Palestinian newspapers are digitalized in a dedicated website: Jrayed - Arabic Newspaper Archive of Ottoman and Mandatory Palestine

org.orgName: Near East School of Theology / Maktabat Kulliyyat al-Lāhu­t li'l-Sharq al-Adnā, Beirut
Periodical collections at the al-Aqṣā Mosque Library in East Jerusalem
org.note: . The collection was digitized by the "Endangered Archives Program" of the British Library and is available online.

org.orgName: School of Oriental and African Studies Library, University of London
Staatsbibliothek zu Berlin, Preußischer Kulturbesitz, Berlin

note.note: no entries in the table match this holding

org.orgName: The Library of the American University in Beirut
The Library of the American University in Cairo

org.note: . Holdings are constantly digitized and made publicly available online.

org.orgName: École de Médecine et de Pharmacie
Police Head Quarters, Ministry of Interior
Maṭrāniyyat al-Rūm al-Ūrthūdhūks/ Jamʿiyyat al-Taʿlīm al-Masīḥī fī Bayrūt
مطرانية الروم الورثوذوكس جمعية التعليم المسيحي في بيروت /
Ministre de l'Intérieur; Direction Général de la Statistique
